title: Needles In Arms (with Christine Jardine MP)
itunes:title: Needles In Arms (with Christine Jardine MP)
description:
Boris Johnson says around 1 in 50 people in England have coronavirus, but promises to speed up the vaccine rollout. Christine Jardine, Liberal Democrat MP for Edinburgh West, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek how best to do it.

Plus, why are officials only just thinking about testing international arrivals? Bloomberg Opinion's Therese Raphael joins to discuss.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
